definitions.definition: ( now rare ) A headache ; a migraine . [from 15th c.]
( now rare ) A fancy, a whim, a caprice. [from 16th c.]
( in the plural ) See megrims ( “ depression; any of various diseases of animals ” ) .

main_definition: ( now rare ) A headache ; a migraine . [from 15th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( now rare ) A fancy, a whim, a caprice. [from 16th c.]
( in the plural ) See megrims ( “ depression; any of various diseases of animals ” ) .

definitions.definition: A flatfish of the genus Lepidorhombus native to the northeastern Atlantic Ocean ; specifically, a Cornish sole , sail-fluke , witch or whiff ( Lepidorhombus whiffiagonis ).

main_definition: A flatfish of the genus Lepidorhombus native to the northeastern Atlantic Ocean ; specifically, a Cornish sole , sail-fluke , witch or whiff ( Lepidorhombus whiffiagonis ).
